name: The VanMan
description:
time to earn your living. you are the man in the van and your job is to observe the situation on the haunted site. manage your equipment and make sure not to let them get to powerfull

you play as the one thats stay behind in the van to watch over an haunted building.
you have to manage the placement of the cameras in your inventory and watch the feeds carefully for changes and anomalies to then report them.

the game itself is a point and click game where you have to specifically target the anomalies in the cameras feed.

manage your inventory of cameras and scanners

keep an watchfull eye on each of the cameras to not miss any changes

earn cash to stock upp on cameras to be able to handle the bigger mapps
